SR latch is a simple memory device with two inputs, Set and Reset

A - Set signal
B - Reset signal
Result is addition of A signal value and B value
Result is subtraction of B signal value from A value
Result is multiplication of A signal value and B value
Result is bitwise AND of A signal value and B signal
Result is division of A signal value by A value
Result is bitwise XOR of A signal value and B signal
Result is bitwise OR of A signal value and B signal
A signal value is equal to B signal
A signal value is greater than B signal
A signal value is greater or equal than B signal
A signal value is less than B signal
A signal value is less or equal than B signal
Result is absolute value of A signal
A signal value is not equal to B signal
Result is the remainder of a division A signal value by B signal
Copy all non zero input signals to output
